author: sussman
msg: * build/buildcheck.sh:  HEAD now requires neon-0.24.X.  Check for it.

author: brane
msg: * subversion/libsvn_subr/config_file.c (svn_config_ensure): Update the
section README.txt template that describes variable substitution, and
add a link to Python's ConfigParser documentation.

author: dimentiy
msg: - "Quick Walkthrough" modified (Added information about ra_svn).
- Russian translation of "Quick Walkthrough" added.

author: sussman
msg: Issue #1443: add runtime option to make svn client trust any 'default' CAs
installed by the OpenSSL sysadmin.
Patch by: Tobias Ringström <tobias@ringstrom.mine.nu>
(Tweaked by me to fit HEAD, and to remove old neon-0.23.X SSL shim code.)
***                       WARNING!                                ****
***    This is the beginning of removal of neon-0.23.9 support!   ****
***       To compile HEAD, you must now run neon-0.24.X.          ****
* subversion/include/svn_config.h
(SVN_CONFIG_OPTION_SSL_TRUST_DEFAULT_CA): new server config file directive.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/config_file.c
(svn_config_ensure): Describe 'ssl-trust-default-ca' in new servers file.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/session.c
(svn_ra_dav__open): Only trust the default CAs if
ssl-trust-default-ca is true.  Also, remove the neon-0.23.9 shim
block.
(client_ssl_callback):  remove old neon shim code blocks.

author: maxb
msg: The docstring for the "overdead" test did not reflect what it actually was
testing. Fixed, but that presumably means we need to add a test that actually
does test how we "handle branches rooted in a redeleted revision".
* tools/cvs2svn/run-tests.py (overdead): Correct docstring.
